News.headline: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v Aldershot Town
News.page_title: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v Aldershot Town
News.URL_keywords: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v Aldershot Town
News.short_description: Tuesday's referee for the Daggers' Vanarama National League home game against Aldershot Town has been named as Robert Whitton
News.description:
The two assistants have been named as Ben Cobb and Wayne Cartmel with the fourth official being Peter Cruise.

Ticket information for the game can be found here.
